gcc -c -O3 -ansi -Isrc -fpic -Wall -Wcast-qual -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wshadow -o src/libqhullstatic/userprintf_rbox.o src/libqhull/userprintf_rbox.c
==========================================
==== If ar fails, try make qhullx ====
==========================================
ar -rs lib/libqhullstatic.a src/libqhullstatic/global.o src/libqhullstatic/stat.o src/libqhullstatic/geom2.o src/libqhullstatic/poly2.o src/libqhullstatic/merge.o src/libqhullstatic/libqhull.o src/libqhullstatic/geom.o src/libqhullstatic/poly.o src/libqhullstatic/qset.o src/libqhullstatic/mem.o src/libqhullstatic/random.o src/libqhullstatic/usermem.o src/libqhullstatic/userprintf.o src/libqhullstatic/io.o src/libqhullstatic/user.o src/libqhullstatic/rboxlib.o src/libqhullstatic/userprintf_rbox.o

#If 'ar -rs' fails try using 'ar -s' with 'ranlib'
#ranlib lib/libqhullstatic.a

src/libqhull_r/rboxlib_r.c:79:16: warning: variable ‘isspiral’ might be clobbered by ‘longjmp’ or ‘vfork’ [-Wclobbered]

                ^

============================================
== Test non-reentrant qset.c with mem.c ====
============================================
bin/testqset 10000
qh_meminitbuffers: memory initialized with alignment 8
SETelemsize is 8 bytes for pointer-to-int


Testing qh_setappend 0..9999.  Test i0 i1 i2 i3 i4 i5 i6 i7 i8 i9 i10 i100 i1000 i9999

Testing qh_settruncate 5000 and 0.  Test n0

Testing qh_setappend2ndlast 0,0..9999.  Test 0 i0 i1 i2 i3 i4 i5 i6 i7 i8 i9 i10 i100 i1000 i9999

Testing SETtruncate_ 5000 and 0.  Test n0

Testing qh_setdelnthsorted and qh_setaddnth 1..9999. Test j1 j2 j3 j4 j5 j6 j7 j8 j9 j10 j100 j1000 j9999

Testing qh_setappend_set 0..9999. Test j0 j1 j2 j3 j4 j5 j6 j7 j8 j9 j10 j100 j1000 j9999

Testing qh_setcompact and qh_setcopy 0..9999. Test j0 j1 j2 j3 j4 j5 j6 j7 j8 j9 j10 j100 j1000 j9999

Testing qh_setequal*, qh_setin*, qh_setdel, qh_setdelnth, and qh_setlarger 0..9999. Test j0 j1 j2 j3 j4 j5 j6 j7 j8 j9 j10 j100 j1000 j9999

Testing qh_settemp* 0..9999. Test j0 j1 j2 j3 j4 j5 j6 j7 j8 j9 j10 j100 j1000 j9999

Testing qh_setlast, qh_setnew_delnthsorted, qh_setunique, and qh_setzero 0..9999. Test j0 j1 j2 j3 j4 j5 j6 j7 j8 j9 j10 j100 j1000 j9999

Testing qh_setdel*, qh_setaddsorted, and  0..9999. Test j0 j1 j2 j3 j4 j5 j6 j7 j8 j9 j10 j100 j1000 j9999
qh_memcheck: check size of freelists on qhmem
qh_memcheck: A segmentation fault indicates an overwrite of qhmem
qh_memcheck: total size of freelists totfree is the same as qhmem.totfree


Not testing qh_setduplicate and qh_setfree2.
  These routines use heap-allocated set contents.  See qhull tests.

memory statistics:
     53 quick allocations
      9 short allocations
   8334 long allocations
     61 short frees
   8334 long frees
     40 bytes of short memory in use
    272 bytes of short memory in freelists

      0 bytes of unused short memory (estimated)

      0 bytes of long memory in use (in 0 pieces)

  65536 bytes per short memory buffer (initially 131072 bytes)
   1148 calls to qh_setlarger
5.5e+02     average copy size
  freelists(bytes->count): 16->0 24->2 32->2 40->4


testqset: OK

bin/rbox D4 | bin/qhull Tv

Starting the rbox smoketest for qhull.  An immediate failure indicates
that non-reentrant rbox was linked to reentrant routines.  An immediate
failure of qhull may indicate that qhull was linked to the wrong
qhull library.  Also try 'rbox D4 | qhull T1'

Output completed.  Verifying that all points are below 2.8e-15 of
all facets.  Will make 13000 distance computations.

  Number of vertices: 50
  Number of facets: 260

  Number of points processed: 50
  Number of hyperplanes created: 712
  Number of distance tests for qhull: 1433
  CPU seconds to compute hull (after input):  0

gcc -c -O3 -ansi -Isrc -fpic -Wall -Wcast-qual -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wshadow -o src/user_eg2/user_eg2_r.o src/user_eg2/user_eg2_r.c


===================================================
== user_eg2 links to  qhullstatic_r.  It may use libqhull_r instead.
===================================================

gcc -o bin/user_eg2 src/user_eg2/user_eg2_r.o -O3 -ansi -Isrc -fpic -Wall -Wcast-qual -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wshadow -Llib -lqhullstatic_r -lm
g++ -c -O3 -Isrc/ -Wall -Wcast-qual -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wno-sign-conversion -Wshadow -Wconversion  -o src/user_eg3/user_eg3_r.o src/user_eg3/user_eg3_r.cpp
g++ -c -O3 -Isrc/ -Wall -Wcast-qual -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wno-sign-conversion -Wshadow -Wconversion  -o src/libqhullcpp/RoadError.o src/libqhullcpp/RoadError.cpp
g++ -c -O3 -Isrc/ -Wall -Wcast-qual -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wno-sign-conversion -Wshadow -Wconversion  -o src/libqhullcpp/RoadLogEvent.o src/libqhullcpp/RoadLogEvent.cpp
g++ -c -O3 -Isrc/ -Wall -Wcast-qual -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wno-sign-conversion -Wshadow -Wconversion  -o src/libqhullcpp/Coordinates.o src/libqhullcpp/Coordinates.cpp
g++ -c -O3 -Isrc/ -Wall -Wcast-qual -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wno-sign-conversion -Wshadow -Wconversion  -o src/libqhullcpp/PointCoordinates.o src/libqhullcpp/PointCoordinates.cpp
g++ -c -O3 -Isrc/ -Wall -Wcast-qual -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wno-sign-conversion -Wshadow -Wconversion  -o src/libqhullcpp/Qhull.o src/libqhullcpp/Qhull.cpp
g++ -c -O3 -Isrc/ -Wall -Wcast-qual -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wno-sign-conversion -Wshadow -Wconversion  -o src/libqhullcpp/QhullFacet.o src/libqhullcpp/QhullFacet.cpp
g++ -c -O3 -Isrc/ -Wall -Wcast-qual -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wno-sign-conversion -Wshadow -Wconversion  -o src/libqhullcpp/QhullFacetList.o src/libqhullcpp/QhullFacetList.cpp
g++ -c -O3 -Isrc/ -Wall -Wcast-qual -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wno-sign-conversion -Wshadow -Wconversion  -o src/libqhullcpp/QhullFacetSet.o src/libqhullcpp/QhullFacetSet.cpp
g++ -c -O3 -Isrc/ -Wall -Wcast-qual -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wno-sign-conversion -Wshadow -Wconversion  -o src/libqhullcpp/QhullHyperplane.o src/libqhullcpp/QhullHyperplane.cpp

g++ -c -O3 -Isrc/ -Wall -Wcast-qual -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wno-sign-conversion -Wshadow -Wconversion  -o src/libqhullcpp/QhullQh.o src/libqhullcpp/QhullQh.cpp
g++ -c -O3 -Isrc/ -Wall -Wcast-qual -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wno-sign-conversion -Wshadow -Wconversion  -o src/libqhullcpp/QhullRidge.o src/libqhullcpp/QhullRidge.cpp
g++ -c -O3 -Isrc/ -Wall -Wcast-qual -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wno-sign-conversion -Wshadow -Wconversion  -o src/libqhullcpp/QhullSet.o src/libqhullcpp/QhullSet.cpp
g++ -c -O3 -Isrc/ -Wall -Wcast-qual -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wno-sign-conversion -Wshadow -Wconversion  -o src/libqhullcpp/QhullStat.o src/libqhullcpp/QhullStat.cpp
g++ -c -O3 -Isrc/ -Wall -Wcast-qual -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wno-sign-conversion -Wshadow -Wconversion  -o src/libqhullcpp/QhullVertex.o src/libqhullcpp/QhullVertex.cpp
g++ -c -O3 -Isrc/ -Wall -Wcast-qual -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wno-sign-conversion -Wshadow -Wconversion  -o src/libqhullcpp/QhullVertexSet.o src/libqhullcpp/QhullVertexSet.cpp
g++ -c -O3 -Isrc/ -Wall -Wcast-qual -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wno-sign-conversion -Wshadow -Wconversion  -o src/libqhullcpp/RboxPoints.o src/libqhullcpp/RboxPoints.cpp
ar -rs lib/libqhullcpp.a src/libqhullcpp/RoadError.o src/libqhullcpp/RoadLogEvent.o src/libqhullcpp/Coordinates.o src/libqhullcpp/PointCoordinates.o src/libqhullcpp/Qhull.o src/libqhullcpp/QhullFacet.o src/libqhullcpp/QhullFacetList.o src/libqhullcpp/QhullFacetSet.o src/libqhullcpp/QhullHyperplane.o src/libqhullcpp/QhullPoint.o src/libqhullcpp/QhullPoints.o src/libqhullcpp/QhullPointSet.o src/libqhullcpp/QhullQh.o src/libqhullcpp/QhullRidge.o src/libqhullcpp/QhullSet.o src/libqhullcpp/QhullStat.o src/libqhullcpp/QhullVertex.o src/libqhullcpp/QhullVertexSet.o src/libqhullcpp/RboxPoints.o
ar: creating lib/libqhullcpp.a
#ranlib lib/libqhullcpp.a
g++ -o bin/user_eg3 src/user_eg3/user_eg3_r.o -O3 -Isrc/ -Wall -Wcast-qual -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wno-sign-conversion -Wshadow -Wconversion  -Llib -lqhullcpp -lqhullstatic_r -lm
gcc -c -O3 -ansi -Isrc -fpic -Wall -Wcast-qual -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wshadow -o src/user_eg/user_eg_r.o src/user_eg/user_eg_r.c
gcc -shared -o lib/libqhull_r.so.7.2.0  src/libqhullstatic_r/global_r.o src/libqhullstatic_r/stat_r.o src/libqhullstatic_r/geom2_r.o src/libqhullstatic_r/poly2_r.o src/libqhullstatic_r/merge_r.o src/libqhullstatic_r/libqhull_r.o src/libqhullstatic_r/geom_r.o src/libqhullstatic_r/poly_r.o src/libqhullstatic_r/qset_r.o src/libqhullstatic_r/mem_r.o src/libqhullstatic_r/random_r.o src/libqhullstatic_r/usermem_r.o src/libqhullstatic_r/userprintf_r.o src/libqhullstatic_r/io_r.o src/libqhullstatic_r/user_r.o src/libqhullstatic_r/rboxlib_r.o src/libqhullstatic_r/userprintf_rbox_r.o
cd lib && ln -f -s libqhull_r.so.7.2.0 libqhull_r.so


===================================================
== If user_eg fails to link on MinGW or Cygwin, use
==   "make SO=dll" and copy lib/libqhull_r.dll to bin/
== Otherwise if user_eg fails to link, switch to -lqhullstatic_r
===================================================

gcc -o bin/user_eg src/user_eg/user_eg_r.o -O3 -ansi -Isrc -fpic -Wall -Wcast-qual -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wshadow  -Llib -lqhull_r -lm
bin/qconvex

qconvex- compute the convex hull.  Qhull 2015.2 2016/01/18
    input (stdin): dimension, number of points, point coordinates
    comments start with a non-numeric character

options (qconvex.htm):
    Qt   - triangulated output
    QJ   - joggled input instead of merged facets
    Tv   - verify result: structure, convexity, and point inclusion
    .    - concise list of all options
    -    - one-line description of all options
    -V   - version

output options (subset):
    s    - summary of results (default)
    i    - vertices incident to each facet
    n    - normals with offsets
    p    - vertex coordinates (includes coplanar points if 'Qc')
    Fx   - extreme points (convex hull vertices)
    FA   - report total area and volume
    FS   - compute total area and volume
    o    - OFF format (dim, n, points, facets)
    G    - Geomview output (2-d, 3-d, and 4-d)
    m    - Mathematica output (2-d and 3-d)
    QVn  - print facets that include point n, -n if not
    TO file- output results to file, may be enclosed in single quotes

examples:
    rbox c D2 | qconvex s n                    rbox c D2 | qconvex i
    rbox c D2 | qconvex o                      rbox 1000 s | qconvex s Tv FA
    rbox c d D2 | qconvex s Qc Fx              rbox y 1000 W0 | qconvex s n
    rbox y 1000 W0 | qconvex s QJ              rbox d G1 D12 | qconvex QR0 FA Pp
    rbox c D7 | qconvex FA TF1000


============================================
== Run the qconvex smoketest
============================================
bin/rbox D4 | bin/qconvex Tv

Starting the rbox smoketest for qhull.  An immediate failure indicates
that non-reentrant rbox was linked to reentrant routines.  An immediate
failure of qhull may indicate that qhull was linked to the wrong
qhull library.  Also try 'rbox D4 | qhull T1'

Output completed.  Verifying that all points are below 2.8e-15 of
all facets.  Will make 13000 distance computations.

Convex hull of 50 points in 4-d:

  Number of vertices: 50
  Number of facets: 260

Statistics for: rbox D4 | qconvex Tv

  Number of points processed: 50
  Number of hyperplanes created: 712
  Number of distance tests for qhull: 1433
  CPU seconds to compute hull (after input):  0


============================================
== To enable user_eg and user_eg2
==
== Windows -- make SO=dll
==     cp -p lib/libqhull*.dll bin
==
== Unix/Macintosh -- make
==     export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$PWD/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
============================================

============================================
== To smoketest qhull programs
==     make test
============================================

============================================
== To run qhull tests for manual review with eg/q_test-ok.txt
==     make testall >q_test.txt 2>&1
============================================

============================================
== For all make targets
==     make help
============================================
